Topic.Title: ETFC Could Be Added To The NASDAQ-100 Soon:

Message.Msg: 1st... let's see some consistent profits

Message.Title: The thoughts of budget cuts regardless of how they happen may improve market sentiment
Message.Msg: If we rally instead of crashing then maybe Congress will get the hint. However, our Markets are as dramatic as a reality show, so probably expect a sell-off.

You make it more difficult, dear. "there was no ACA in 2009....." HR 3590 (ACA) was introduced in the summer of 2009. It was voted in the House in late December 2009. CBO report was requested by Pelosi to set the vote. Preliminary acceptable condition for the vote to take place was the cost for ACA not exceeding $1T, which Douglas W. Elmendorf successfully "delivered". Anyone can google this report and see what's in it. Although, when Senate vote took place in March 2010, the CBO estimate was already changed upward to be around $1.2T. I gave you quotes from articles from Weekly Standard, you on the other hand do not refer to direct source either. Actual report is more for professionals to digest, so good luck with it. Fact is, CBO itself released numbers, they were cited in the media and the cost was revised upward but magically "balanced" by other parts of the program. "rightwing blather" disageed. But GAO claming Obama care will add $6T to US debt in the future decade. You can hardly call GAO a "rightwing blather". In my eyes CBO lost its credibility.

He makes recess appoinments when Congress is not in recess. He makes executuve orders overwriting existing laws, by which he oversteps the bounds of executive branch power. b. My main point was not about legality of what Obama should or shouldn't do in this case. White House threatening journalist is not inapropriate, it is next to criminal.

Topic.Title: Conservatives Regret Taking Woodward’s ‘Threat’ Story Seriously

Message.Msg: WH is back pedalling full speed. Distorting the picture as usual. Woodward was shouted at, scolded. It was probably the first time Bob got disobedient and he discovered Obama administration behaving like dictators. So, since when Politico became conservative source?

That part about the Obama administration I'll agree with. It's hard to indict a public official for anything without a massive supporting press storm, and that's not gonna happen on Barry's watch. At least not unless the scandal is so overwhelmingly obvious that not even the New York Times can just ignore it, as they have other stories. I suppose the other great advantage is that it's hard to criticize someone when they really don't DO anything. So far more of his appointees have been happy to let the agency professionals run things while they sit back and collect a check, For instance it's fairly obvious that some of them are either asleep on the job or are inimicable to the agencies to which they've been assigned, like assigning a tee-totaling anti-gun liberal who doesn't smoke or like loud noises to run the BATFE (and whatever initials they might have added to indicate their "additional responsibilities"). Since he knows nothing about booze, cigars, handguns, and what explosive is best to use in which situation, well, wrong choice eh?

Topic.Title: Boy, wasn't that expected from this WH?

Message.Msg: Woodward is right, Even INS has been releasing imprisoned illegals awaiting deportation because they "won't have the budget to hold them once the sequester kicks in". Never mind asking why instead of releasing them they simply didn't load them into boxcars and dump them off in Juarez? The Mexicans shouldn't be able to complain about it as we'll only send back the ones that snuck over from THEIR side of the border. So even if they're from Central or South America, well, you let them leak through your borders, so here you are, send them back south.

Topic.Title: Conservatives Regret Taking Woodward’s ‘Threat’ Story Seriously

Message.Msg: The problem remains that the WH is threatening to use those cuts to target prime programs as if they were the ONLY place the fat could be trimmed. They're not, and many of the "dire consequences" of the sequester are things the Democrats knew they could afford to begin with. Basically Obama is sacrificing his Bishop in order to promote a Pawn (the next Democratic candidates in the midterms).

Topic.Title: Conservatives Regret Taking Woodward’s ‘Threat’ Story Seriously
